table_foot: Abbreviations: CDR, Clinical Dementia Rating scale; CHS, Cardiovascular Health Study frailty score; CN, cognitively normal; DSM‐III‐R, Diagnostic and Statistical Manual, third edition revised; DTI, diffusion tensor imaging; EFS, Edmonton frailty scale; fMRI, functional magnetic resonance imaging; IST, Isaacs Set Test; MCI, mildly cognitively impaired; MEG, magnetoencephalography; MMSE, Mini‐Mental State Examination; MRI, magnetic resonance imaging; NINCDS‐ADRDA, National Institute of Neurological and Communicative Disorders and Stroke–Alzheimer's Disease and Related Disorders Association; PET, positron emission tomography.aMedian, IQR.
